product_name: Camaro Titanium Baselayer Wetsuit Top - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ideal for layering under a full wetsuit or wearing on its own, the Camaro Titanium Baselayer Wetsuit Top is made with 2mm-thick open cell SCS Titanium neoprene for a snug fit and good warmth. Wear the Camaro Titanium Baselayer Wetsuit when you're surfing, paddling or swimming. Titanium neoprene material greatly improves drying times-shake it out once and it is dry! Provides UPF 50+ sun protection. Seams are glued and blind stitched to be watertight. Closeout.
short_description: Ideal for layering under a full wetsuit or wearing on its own, the Camaro Titanium Baselayer Wetsuit Top is made with 2mm-thick open cell SCS Titanium neoprene for a snug fit and good warmth.
